scripts.web: bun run kill && concurrently "bun run bridge" "npx rspack serve"
scripts.app: bun run kill && npx tauri dev
scripts.bridge: bun run kill && cargo run --manifest-path bridge/Cargo.toml --bin bridge-server
scripts.build:bridge: bun run kill && cargo build --release --manifest-path bridge/Cargo.toml --bin bridge-server
scripts.build:web: bun run kill && bun run build:bridge && npx rspack build --mode production
scripts.serve: bun run kill && concurrently "bun run bridge" "npx serve dist -p 3000"
scripts.build:app: bun run kill && npx tauri build
scripts.kill: npx kill-port 3000 3001 || (taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul || pkill -f "rspack\|tauri" 2>/dev/null || echo "Ports cleared")
scripts.clean: bun run kill && rm -rf dist bridge/target src-tauri/target
